title:
Mathematical modeling and analysis of a tumor invasion problem with
  angiogenesis and taxis cascade
abstract:
We propose a mathematical model for tumor invasion supported by angiogenesis
and interactions with the surrounding tissue. For the model deduction we employ
a multiscale approach starting from lower scales and obtaining by an informal
parabolic upscaling a system of reaction-diffusion-taxis equations with a
so-called 'taxis cascade', where one species is performing taxis towards a
signal whose production/decay is controled by the other, for which it also
serves as a tactic cue. We prove global existence and uniqueness of solutions
to the obtained PDE-ODE system and perform numerical simulations to illustrate
the behavior of solutions.
